# printableRect

**Instance Property**

The rectangle that represents the portion of the paper that can be imaged upon.

## Declaration

```swift
var printableRect: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

Typically, UIKit passes this value into the last argument of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintPageRenderer] method [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintPageRenderer/drawPage(at:in:)].

## Getting the paper size and the printing area

- **paperSize**: The size of the sheet to use for printing.
